channel.title: Making a [508] server to work?
channel.description:
[b]Ok guys i downloaded a 508 server jagex 1.0 or sumthing and i went to the runserver thing and came with errors and stuff
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/espeon/Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.espeon.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: net/com/espeon/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
Is the errors when i Run the [size=15pt]Runserver[/size]
And this is the errors when i do[size=15pt] Build[/size]
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/espeon/Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.espeon.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:252) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:320) Could not find the main class: net/com/espeon/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . Plz help idk what to do???[/b]
Mabey somone can give me some link to help or tuts or download idk plz just somone help me!
